content: this luscious stitch along crochet blanket boasts 4 weeks of crochet fun and a whole lot of color created in shades of caron jumbo twirl each of the first 3 weeks focuses on a different style of hexagonal motif while the 4th week wraps up the fun with joining and fringe instructions to finish your majestic masterpiece you ll learn working hexagon motifs in the round working half hexagons back and forth overlays lacy-style chain stiches flat slip-stitch and much more materials caron® jumbo twirl™ 12 oz/340 g 578 yds/528 m contrast a canal ribbon 83001 1 ball or 538 yds/492 m contrast b sky blue ribbon 83016 1 ball or 538 yds/492 m contrast c terra cotta ribbon 83009 1 ball or 200 yds/183 m contrast d off white ribbon 83003 1 ball or 523 yds/479 m contrast e peony ribbon 83002 1 ball or 459 yds/420 m contrast f violet ribbon 83008 1 ball or 459 yds/420 m measurements approx 56½ 143 5 cm x 64½ 163 5 cm excluding fringe gauges 11 double_crochet and 6 5 row = 4 10 cm motifs = approx 14 35 5 cm diameter or 16 40 5 cm measured across from tip-to-tip
